data.title: Bill Johnson
data.meta_description: Bill is the design principal for the Denver studio and for HOK’s Sports + Recreation + Entertainment practice.
data.text:
Bill is the design principal for the Denver studio and for HOK’s Sports + Recreation + Entertainment practice. Over the course of his career, Bill has applied his expertise and design sensitivity to a wide variety of project types to create award-winning mixed-use, corporate office and civic projects.

Recognized as a leader in the design of sports and entertainment facilities, including Atlanta’s iconic Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Bill’s portfolio of work includes professional and collegiate facilities across the country. He develops highly creative, integrated solutions that achieve the objectives of each client while contributing to the vitality of the broader community. He also is on a perpetual quest to create a sensational game-day experience.

Bill serves on HOK’s design board and is based in the firm’s Denver studio. Sports Business Journal named him to its list of “power players” in sports facility design and development and Engineering News-Record honored him as a “Top 25 Newsmaker.”
